import React from 'react' import ReactDOM from 'react-dom' import {Parallax, ParallaxLayer} from 'react-spring/renderprops-addons' import {useSpring, animated} from 'react-spring' // Little helpers ... const calc = (x, y) => [x - window.innerWidth / 2, y - window.innerHeight / 2] const trans1 = (x, y) => `translate3d(${x / 10}px,${y / 10}px,0)` const trans2 = (x, y) => `translate3d(${x / 8 + 35}px,${y / 8 - 230}px,0)` const trans3 = (x, y) => `translate3d(${x / 6 - 250}px,${y / 6 - 200}px,0)` const trans4 = (x, y) => `translate3d(${x / 3.5}px,${y / 3.5}px,0)` class App extends React.Component { render() { return ( (this.parallax = ref)}> this.parallax.scrollTo(1)}style={{color: '#ffffff'}}>Layers can contain anything

Hi

 ) } } ReactDOM.render(, document.getElementById('root'))
